trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Wilsonville
There were no other sightings in Wilsonville on or around April 10th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsthis report is for a coworker, his computer is not working. he and his girlfriend were driving north on I-5from woodburn when around the wilsonville exit nexted to Frys Electronics they saw lights so bright it lit up like a football stadium. no school in the area. they thought it might be milatary but there was no outline of a craft.it was stationary about 300 ft of the ground.they drive this route everynight and have never seen this before. they lost sight of it while driving up the freway. lights were unlike anything they have seen before.
Summary: very bright lights about300ft off the ground not moving
